comments.text:
When you're giving a (admittedly well-intentioned) rant on bigotry and 
closed-mindedness, you lose a lot of your momentum when you claim bigotry 
is equivalent to special needs.  Bigots are not "mentally challenged". 
 "Mentally Challenged" people are not by nature hateful.  The phrase 
"mentally challenged", though, when used to describe a group of people whom 
you disagree with, is bigoted and closed-minded.﻿

relate Conservatives to ignorant, incestuous, illiterate drop-outs despite

anti-Obama". Well guess what: We are the workers that build and maintain
